summary: Player living space near riverwood no loading cells
descriptionHtml:
Location Riverwood behind the Sleeping Giant inn look for the tent icon (Check Pictures) 

Recommend Class Type for mod:Class Type : Thief 
***************************************************************** 
Welcome back to one of my old mods from last year the very popular thiefs nook,this is for 
a pure thief type char but could be played as an assassain if you wanted i guess.This shelter 
is a ideal starter mod for your thief char with no loading interior cells just walk in and use it,simple 
but very decorative it has a strongbox and storage barrel for items with a full cooking area. 
Also there is a stolen merchants cart with a strongbox of leveled items near the shelter,a fish rack 
and a barrel of respawning food is also includied.A full set of thiefs armor (Enchanted) with 
a weapon and supplies are also included,a talos statue is inside to remove any diseases 
and a simple bedroll for sleeping is also in the shelter.This is a very nice little mod to get you 
started with your char or to keep through the game well worth a download,thanks for looking. 

Full set of riverwood thief armor 
Daedric Dagger 
Thief\'s Ring & Necklace 
Alchemy Supplies 
Full set of thefs armor 
Night eye spell (Simular to vampire or khajit night vision) 
Weapon & Supllies (Lockpicks,Gold) 
Merchants strongbox with leveled items 
Alchemy table for posions & potions 

Thanks for looking...
author: EvilMrPumpkinsNexus
